reviewText: We send tour groups to the 9-11 Museum in New York and this is a great introduction to the museum; our tour director plays it on the coach.  This video will send chills down your spine -- Steven Spielberg at his best.
I'm glad I was able to purchase this DVD. Great documentary.
For Someone there and part of Recovery it was Ecellent !!

This is a fascinating documentary on the rebuilding of the WTC site. The buildings, the museums and,  most uniquely, the symbolism and reasoning behind how they rebuilt that area. I was one of the frustrated many who could not understand why it was taking so long to rebuild,  but this explains how much thought and design went into it.  If you ever plan to visit the 9/11 memorial in NYC, you must watch this documentary. It will help you understand and appreciate what was done.
this is a very important series for me. I was so happy to have the opportunity to own it. Thank you so much.
I watched this on the 10th anniversary.  It was well done and very moving inside information pertaining to the aftermath of 9-11.  Highly recommended.
Arrived in a timely manner and it was very interesting, and sad but beautifully done.
My husband has been looking for this show on dvd for a while, happy he finally found it. Great series of shows on the rebuilding of the twin tower site.
Everyone should watch this DVD and see what true team work and purpose is about.

"very great dvd movie really goes into detail about the effects of the detail as the effects after 9/11 but you need to watch all of the tracks with last about 5 hours but its worth it all very happy with seller package was shipped right away it great condition "a must see movie
